details.sectionContent: This workshop will teach you to build your own Arduino.

Arduino is very prominent these days for itâ€™s for ability to make new digital devices using microcontroller and microprocessors. Here you will get a chance to make your own arduino,learn sensor interfacing and at the end we will provide you with Image processing demo.

Students will make own charger. Knowledge of Microcontroller and how it will work as an arduino.Details about different sensors and their functions.Interfacing of different sensors like IR, LDR, Buzzer. Demo of Image Processing and Ultrasonic sensor with its functions.
Understanding of programming for each provided sensor. Software Installation. Doubt clearing session
Kit will be containing of all parts except demo components. Deep understanding of world inside microcontroller and Arduino.

Location: IT Seminar hall

On 13th Feb,2019:
  Session 1: @ 10:45 pm
  Session 2: @ 1:45 pm 
On 14th Feb,2019:
  Session 3: @ 10:30 pm
  Session 4: @ 1:45 pm
